name: Sea Adventurer
description:
Note: Do not use the map in the title or failure screens as it will crash the game.

You are an explorer looking to expand your ship by collecting crew members and treasure. Once you've fulfilled your upgrade quota of both then your ship will automatically upgrade.

Watch out, though, for on your adventure you will come across fearsome pirates, and maybe more lurking in the depths of the water. Your cannons will automatically fire based on how many crew members you have. The more the better!

You will also be collecting pieces of map to help guide you to other items.  More of the world map will unlock with each piece that you get.

Deaths will restart your position but not you will not lose your stats.

Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Use Docks

M - Use Map (do not use on title/failure screen)

X - See Ship Stats

F5 - Skip Title

F11 - Toggle Music

Escape - Exit

Made by Adam and Rachel Dally for the Nokia 3310 - Jam 4
